Html:
Just downloaded Rawr today and loaded up my DK tank, I was trying to work out what would be the better upgrade with my frost emblems a Trinket or a tier 10 piece. Clicked on trinkets and to my shock it says that Death's Verdict is the best trinket a DK tank can use 0_0 placing tanking trinket right at the bottom and it is on TankDK Model...

 

Any ideas why this is?

Attack Power = Threat
Strength = More Parry and Attack Power, which goes back to above.

Also, it's may have the most point value for trinkets, but that doesn't mean it's the best.

Death's Verdict information is cached wrong. If you look at it closely it probably still has a "51000%" in the data. Refreshing relevant items on trinkets will fix this and give you more accurate results.
